com.bartabs.ws.authenticate.service

Class TokenService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bartabs.ws.authenticate.service.TokenService

  • @Service(value="Authenticate.TokenService")
public class TokenService
extends java.lang.Object
    The TokenService class provides the methods necessary to encode and decode JWT tokens

    2017-04-12
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • encodeToken

        public java.lang.String encodeToken(java.lang.String subject)
                             throws TokenEncodeException
        Encodes a string into a token using the JSON Web Token library
        Parameters:
        subject - a String containing the information to be converted into a token
        Returns:
        a token
        Throws:
        TokenEncodeException - thrown when token encoding fails

      • decodeToken

        public io.jsonwebtoken.Jws<io.jsonwebtoken.Claims> decodeToken(java.lang.String token)
                                                        throws TokenDecodeException
        Decodes a token and returns the Jws<Claims> values
        Parameters:
        token - a JWT token
        Returns:
        Jws<Claims> values
        Throws:
        TokenDecodeException - thrown when the token provided is invalid or a fault occurs during decoding
